articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Pakistani President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Pakistani President
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Asif Ali Zardari, president of Pakistan, in connection with the airliner accident in Islamabad that claimed big casualties.
					 Kim, in the message, expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president and, through him, to the victims and the bereaved families.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Morocco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Morocco
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Mohamed VI, king of Morocco, on the occasion of its national day.
					Kim in the message sincerely wished the people of Morocco steady progress and prosperity, expressing conviction that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Chinese Assistant to FM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Chinese Assistant to FM
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, director of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Hu Zhengyue, assistant to Foreign Minister of China, and his party Thursday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: DPRK, China Sign Economic Cooperation Agreement
articles.content:
DPRK, China Sign Economic Cooperation Agreement
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- An inter-governmental agreement on economic and technical cooperation was signed between the DPRK and China here on Thursday. 
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam and officials concerned and from the opposite side Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai and his embassy officials.
					
					 It was inked by Ri Ryong Nam and Liu Hongcai.

articles.title: Credentials of German Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of German Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday received credentials from Gerhard Thiedemann, German ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 After receiving the credentials Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Phibada Opera Troupe Stages after Return from China
articles.content:
Phibada Opera Troupe Stages after Return from China
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe staged opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre Thursday after their return from China.
					 Appreciating the opera were senior party and state officials, officials of ministries and national institutions, creators, artistes, journalists and editors in the field of culture and art and media and working people in the city.
					
					 Present on invitation were the ambassador and staff members of the Chinese embassy here and Chinese guests.
					
					 The performers made refined and perfect artistic representation and presented beautiful melodies with peculiar folk singing method and pangchang and attractive dances and brilliant stage decor, mesmerizing the audience.
					
					The audience expressed profound thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il for having made sure that the opera, which was created and completed in the DPRK in the 1960s at the initiative of President Kim Il Sung and under his meticulous guidance, was reproduced as the best masterpiece on the occasion of the "year of the DPRK-China friendship" to beautifully cultivate the flower garden of the DPRK-China friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries.
					
					 They spoke high praises of the remarkable talents and skills of the artistes of the new generation who have been trained under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea, keenly realizing once again the might of the Juche-based arts of tremendous potential.

articles.title: Dam of Kumyagang Power Station Completed
articles.content:
Dam of Kumyagang Power Station Completed
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- A dam of the large Kumyagang Power Station was completed in the east coastal area of the DPRK. 
					 The dam created a grand power base with rich water resources in the upper reaches of Kumya River and made it possible to satisfactorily water tens of thousands hectares of paddy and non-paddy fields with the help of the grand man-made lake, thus providing a reliable guarantee for boosting agricultural production.
					
					 In hearty response to the gigantic nature-remaking plan of the Workers' Party of Korea the soldier and civilian builders launched dynamic general offensive from the first day of the construction with unanimous will to finish ahead of schedule the construction of the power station which is of important significance in the country's electrification and bring about better future. 
					
					 Relevant units have ensured timely provision of necessary equipment and materials while educational and scientific research institutes provided scientific and technological guarantees for the construction of the dam. 
					
					 Thanks to the patriotism of the builders and help from across the country, a great dam made its majestic appearance in the upper part of Kumya River formerly covered with natural forests.

articles.title: Employees of Namhung Chemical Complex Commended
articles.content:
Employees of Namhung Chemical Complex Commended
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Official commendations were given to officials, builders and technicians who performed labor feats in the construction of the process of producing fertilizer by the gasification of anthracite at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex in the DPRK.
					 A ceremony for awarding commendations took place on Thursday.
					
					 The title of Labor Hero together with Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag 1st Class was conferred on 18 persons.
					
					The commendation of watch bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung went to 20 persons and the citation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, to 24 persons.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize was awarded to three persons, honorary titles to 13, Order of National Flag 1st Class, Order of Labor, Order of National Flag 2nd Class, Order of National Flag 3rd Class, Distinguished Military Service Medal and Medal of Merit to many officials, builders and technicians.

articles.title: Symposium on Feature Film Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Feature Film Held
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- A symposium on the Juche-oriented literary and art idea for the Korean feature film "Lovely Sunshine" (Part 1) took place on Thursday.
					 Present there were leading officials in the field of culture and the arts, creators, artistes and teachers and researchers of universities. 
					
					Speakers at the symposium referred to the fact that the creators and artistes have zealously conducted the creative work to produce a movie on the contest of art groups of servicemen's families, true to the noble intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Deeply experiencing the reality, the creators wrote the scenarios flawless in ideological content and artistry telling about the fact that the benevolence shown by Kim Jong Il is the lovely sunshine as he puts wives of officers forward as women revolutionaries and the second bugler in the era of Songun, they noted.
					
					They said that the film impressively shows the noble ideological and moral world of servicemen's wives, through portrayal of their life dedicated to soldiers and the heroine earnestly saying that any wife will be entitled to attend the contest only when she has done admirable things delighting
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Shooting of screens vividly showing the temperament of heroine and other characters and the human relations and the successful acting of characters suited to their temperament and logic of life made contribution to enriching the film, they pointed out.
					
					 They called upon all creators and artistes to produce more masterpieces which fully reflect the spirit of the era and are conducive to the development of the Juche-based cinematic art.

articles.title: Anniversary of Egyptian Revolution Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Egyptian Revolution Marked
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Egyptian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein Thursday gave a reception on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the July 23 revolution in Egypt.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Egypt Friendship Association, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Mun Song Mo, director of the Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Egyptian embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Malaysian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Malaysian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Rahimi Bin Harun and staff members of the Malaysian embassy here did a friendly work on the DPRK-Malaysia Friendship Ponghwa Cooperative Farm in Kangdong County, Pyongyang, on Thursday.
					 They helped farmers in weeding the cotton field.
					
					 The guests handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Pyongyang Maternity Hospital 30 Years Old
articles.content:
Pyongyang Maternity Hospital 30 Years Old
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Maternity Hospital has been birthplace of at least 710,000 children since its foundation on July 30, Juche 69 (1980) and many barren women became mothers there.
					 The women in the DPRK call the hospital the benevolent baby's palace and their parents' home as they enjoy the benefits of free medical care.
					
					 More than 390 triplets and quadruplets were born and over 600 triplets have grown up there for the past 30 years since the birth of the first triplet in September 1980. 
					
					 During this period competent mobile medical service units rushed to different parts of the country to assist more than 220 women in childbirth of triplets and helicopters flew to several places of the country including its northern tip and the secluded mountainous villages to bring 16 triplets back to their life by a miracle.
					
					 The hospital is equipped with all possible conditions for women diagnosed to have been conceived with triplets to receive hospital treatment for several months for easy delivery and a system of bringing them up till they weigh 4 kg each. 
					
					 When the first triplets arrived in July 1947 President Kim Il Sung put his heart and soul into bringing them up and taking care of their health, saying it was a very auspicious event that the first triplet was born in the liberated country. He saw to it that the state takes special care of triplets and their mothers with responsibility in the future. 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il initiated the construction of the best maternity hospital in the world and personally chose its site. He even made sure that the wonderful floor studded with jewels decorated in the pattern of beautiful flowers was paved at the hospital and has steadily sent advanced medical appliances and equipment, valuable medicines, honey and tonics more than hundred times.
					
					 Whenever triplets were born, he wished them happy future before anybody else and saw to it that they are given different kinds of gifts including not only clothes, blankets and nutritious food but cloths for their wedding dresses. He also made sure that silver-decorated knives (for baby boys) and gold rings (for baby girls) with the date of their birth carved were given to them as gifts to be memorable in their lifetime. 
					
					 So all triplets who were born after the country's liberation and their parents received those gifts. 
					
					 Today the party and the state make sure that the triplets are taken care of by doctors, nurses and nursery school teachers exclusively in charge of their upbringing from the moment of their birth. Their lives and health have been protected in a scientific way thanks to the state system of general medical examination and health care. They grow up at provincial baby homes until they become four years old and then their parents are granted state benefit till they reach 8 years old.

articles.title: New Kind of Microgenerator Made
articles.content:
New Kind of Microgenerator Made
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Taean Heavy Machine Complex in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has made a new kind of microgenerator.
					 It can generate electricity with a little amount of water, service and foul water and industrial waste water.
					
					 Its generating capacity is 500w and the frequency is 60Hz. With a voltage regulation as low as less than 6 percent and a high power-factor, it ensures long-time operation in different load conditions.
					
					 It, without exciter, brush and slip ring, is little affected by harmonics.
					
					 It is also available for wind-driven generating.
					
					 The new invention has already been introduced in many units.

articles.title: Output of Consumer Goods Goes Up
articles.content:
Output of Consumer Goods Goes Up
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Light industry factories in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have boosted the output of consumer goods.
					The Manpho Spinning Mill surpassed this year's plan at 117 percent as of mid-July by raising the production rate, fully securing raw and other materials and introducing effective technological inventions.
					
					The foodstuff factory in Sinphyong County, North Hwanghae Province, lifted the production of essential foodstuffs six times and the paper mill in Unjon County, North Phyongan Province raised the production of notebooks 6.6 times in the first half of the year compared with the corresponding period of last year.
					
					Ryanggang Province has concentrated on technological updating of locally-controlled industry factories to step up the output of consumer goods. 
					
					Samjiyon County has streamlined the soy and bean paste factory and applied its success and experience to other factories.
					
					Kapsan, Unhung and other counties have updated existing factories, while increasing the output of primary consumer goods.
					
					The Kanggye Pencil Factory and the Kanggye Plastic Daily Necessities Factory have invigorated the mass technological innovation movement for increased production. 
					
					The Sinuiju Enamel Ware Factory, the Sinuiju Plastic Daily Necessities Factory, the Sinuiju Household Goods Factory and other factories and enterprises in the city have made varieties of consumer goods with by-products.

articles.title: US Deceptive Advocacy of "Nuclear Disarmament" Flayed
articles.content:
US Deceptive Advocacy of "Nuclear Disarmament" Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The United States is stepping up the development and production of up-to-date conventional weapons. This goes to prove that the "reduction" of nuclear warheads advocated by the U.S. is no more than a deceptive trick to tone down the world public's demand for the termination of nuclear weapons.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The U.S. puts spurs to the production of new-type weapons and their updating in substitute for "reducing" the nuclear warheads. It cannot be construed otherwise than replenishment and renewal of nuclear weapons. 
					
					 The U.S. seeks to produce and retain sophisticated weapons with larger offensive and destructive power in place of removing outdated nuclear weapons, which means arms buildup and considerable increase of offensive ability.
					
					 Such scheme for arms buildup on the part of the U.S. is aimed to provide advanced weapons and equipment in keeping with its priority strategy and regional strategy. After the end of the Cold War the U.S. newly formulated its strategy for world domination and, under this strategy, has worked toward to supplying the light and high-performance weapons as well as the reorganization and deployment of its troops. Nevertheless, it advertises that it is bringing change in the disarmament.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup and updating are fanning up the world-wide arms race and brining about the danger of a new war.
					
					 The reality requires the progressive countries to heighten their vigilance against the U.S. deceptive "disarmament" trick and thoroughly prepare themselves to take military counteraction to it.
					
					 Recently the U.S. strategic strike forces including nuclear-powered aircraft carrier have stormed south Korea and its surrounding areas like a flock of crows to get hell-bent on the war games, driving the situation to the phase of war. 
					
					 The grave situation prevailed on the Korean Peninsula more clearly proves that it is quite natural and right for the DPRK to have concentrated efforts on bolstering up its defense capability.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Immense Pride of Korean Women
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Immense Pride of Korean Women
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean women are the dignified women who have pushed one of the wheels of revolutionary chariot together with men after the promulgation of the law on sex equality 64 years ago the first of its kind in human history. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday stresses this in a jointly signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean women's heroic stamina is depicted in the imposing Chollima Statue soaring to the blue sky of the country. There are a great many statues in the world which portray knights on horseback threading the battlefield. But there is no such statue with a woman on its back as the Chollima Statue which represents a legendary horse dashing a thousand-ri (400 kilometers) at a breath. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung worked the miracle of history of breaking down the unethical outlook on the women which has been conventionalized and institutionalized as unbreakable ethics and morals worldwide for thousands of years. 
					
					 He was the dear leader and kind father whom the humankind acclaimed for the first time in the history of women's movement. Thanks to his arduous and glorious history a new world of freedom and emancipation for the women was ushered in leading to the bright world today. 
					
					 Convinced that inexhaustible is the ability of the women to transform the society, the nature and themselves, General Secretary Kim Jong Il made sure that women are provided with high and wide-ranging posts in political, economic, military, cultural and all other fields. 
					
					 In the DPRK special importance is attached to the issue of talented women and woman officials and women are granted top priority benefit and treatment regardless of their jobs under the rules set by the state.  
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, the anti-Japanese heroine, was a typical Korean woman revolutionary who pioneered the sacred history of devotedly defending the leader, made a breakthrough in the Korean revolution with a lofty mission and responsibility as a revolutionary comrade of the President and gave birth to and brought up the future of the Korean revolution. The ranks of the Korean women rallied around her have grown to be the ranks of loyalists of Kim Jong Suk type and the large contingents of the woman revolutionaries. 
					
					 The Korean women are not only the leader's revolutionary comrades sharing the purpose and destiny with him but dynamic and resourceful ones carrying out half of the country's affairs as well as flowers of the revolution and flowers of the country possessed of the most beautiful and noblest traits. 
					
					 The destiny of the Korean women in the 21st century is guaranteed by the ever-victorious leadership provided by Kim Jong Il. The Korean women are beautiful flowers in full bloom under the warm sunrays of the great sun, the article concludes.

articles.title: Stop to Project for "Four Rivers" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Project for "Four Rivers" Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- At least 1,300 Christians of south Korea on Monday made public a declaration in protest against the project for "improving four large rivers" on the part of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 In the declaration they accused the authorities of their unreasonable action such as unilaterally and forcibly pushing the project despite the opposition of the overwhelming majority of the people.
					
					 To destroy environment under the pretext of "economic development" is a crime, they pointed out, declaring that they would conduct the protest campaign until the project has been stopped.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released a statement on Monday denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for their frantic joint military exercises.
					 Referring to the fact that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities started in the East Sea of Korea the large-scale joint naval exercises with huge armed forces involved despite the protests of people at home and abroad, the statement said that this is rendering the situation of the Korean Peninsula so strained that a war may break out anytime.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak "government" opted for aggravating the tension on the Korean Peninsula through "military display" in a foolish attempt to take a tit-for-tat against the defeat they suffered in diplomacy over the case of the warship "Cheonan" sinking, the statement charged.
					
					 It demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers stop at once the war maneuvers for aggression on the DPRK, start the reinvestigation into the truth about the "Cheonan" case and opt for building a peacekeeping mechanism through dialogue and negotiations.

articles.title: Korea's Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korea's Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on July 22 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The statement noted that in the work Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification and that Kim Jong Il led all the people to hold fast to the charters in the national reunification movement.
					
					 The three charters for national reunification serve as the most reasonable and fair and aboveboard great programme for reunification in line with the actual conditions of Korea, in which differing ideologies and systems exist in the north and the south, and the unanimous desire of the Korean nation for reunification, the statement noted.
					
					 Fully supporting all the measures taken by the DPRK for national reunification, the statement hoped that the Korean people would achieve the country's reunification as soon as possible under the banner of the three charters.

articles.title: US and S. Korea Moves to Provoke Nuclear War Flailed
articles.content:
US and S. Korea Moves to Provoke Nuclear War Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, in a statement on July 25 said whoever wants the peace and reunification of the country should turn out as one in the struggle to check and frustrate the moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea to ignite a nuclear war.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers finally kicked off the large-scale joint naval exercises in the East Sea of Korea aimed at mounting a preemptive strike at the DPRK under the pretext of the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking, defying the strong domestic and foreign opposition and denunciation.
					
					 It noted that not only the said exercises but the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises slated to be staged in mid-August and other war maneuvers to be launched one after another till the end of this year are the largest-ever joint military exercises far surpassing the preceding ones and mock drills simulating the second Korean war which would inflict unheard-of nuclear disaster upon the Korean nation.
					
					 The on-going nuclear war exercises are by no means "demonstration of armed forces of defensive nature" to deter someone's "threat" but war maneuvers for aggression targeted against the DPRK from A to Z, the statement said, stressing that traitor Lee Myung Bak can never evade curses and denunciation by fellow countrymen for all ages for his crimes of having taken the lead in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, while acting a shock brigade for nuclear war maneuvers.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all the Koreans in China bitterly oppose and reject the moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak puppet group for escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen and war racket for invading the DPRK and will wage more dynamic struggle to defend peace against the U.S. and war, it noted.
					
					 The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. also issued a statement on July 23 denouncing the reckless military provocation moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- One day in June Juche 89 (2000), General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the Nyongbyon Silk Mill.
					 The temperature was over 30 degrees centigrade that day.
					
					 Under the sweltering sun he looked round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions of President Kim Il Sung and the monument to his field guidance in the compound of the mill, being briefed on its history. He then went round various workshops to learn about how production was going on.
					
					 He highly appreciated the workers and technicians of the mill who had produced various kinds of quality silk fabrics to greatly contribute to solving the clothing issue.
					
					 He called on them to sharply increase the production of silk fabrics favored by the people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencia al presidente pakistani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencia al presidente pakistani
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 29 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, Asif Ali Zardari, en relacion con que se produjeron muchas perdidas humanas por el accidente de un avion de pasajeros en Islamabad.
					En la misiva el remitente expreso la profunda compasion y condolencia al destinatario y, por su conducto, a los damnificados y los familiares de estos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il se reune con Hu Zhengyue
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il se reune con Hu Zhengyue
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Kim Yong Il, jefe de Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 29 con el asistente del ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular China, Hu Zhengyue, y su comitiva que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Firmado acuerdo sobre cooperacion economica y tecnica Corea-China
articles.content:
Firmado acuerdo sobre cooperacion economica y tecnica Corea-China
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 29 en esta capital el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion economica y tecnica entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica Popular China.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam y otros funcionarios y por la china, el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica china en Corea.
					
					 Ri y Liu suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador aleman
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador aleman
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Gerhard Thiedemann presento el dia 29 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Federal de Alemania en Corea.
					 Tras recibirlas Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela caracter enganoso de "reduccion nuclear"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela caracter enganoso de "reduccion nuclear"
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos acelera el desarrollo y la produccion de las modernas armas convencionales.
					Esto demuestra que la "reduccion" de las ojivas atomicas de que habla ese imperio no pasa de ser una artimana enganosa para calmar la opinion publica del mundo que demanda la eliminacion de las armas nucleares.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 29 y continua:
					
					EE.UU. trata de producir y poseer las modernas armas con mayor capacidad ofensiva y destructiva en vez de eliminar las viejas armas nucleares, lo cual es el aumento de las fuerzas armadas y el gran fortalecimiento de la capacidad de ataque.
					
					 El aumento armamentista de EE.UU. es para desarrollar las armas y equipos modernos conforme a su estrategia de enfoque, la regional.
					
					 Despues del fin de la guerra fria el imperio establecio una nueva estrategia de dominio al mundo. Para ese efecto, toma el camino de reorganizar y reubicar las unidades militares y realizar el aligeramiento y alta eficiencia de las armas.
					
					  Por otra parte, habla tanto de algun cambio en el dominio de reduccion armamentista.
					
					  Debido al aumento armamentista y la modernizacion de las armas de EE.UU. se fomenta la carrera armamentista y se crea el nuevo peligro de guerra a escala mundial.
					
					  La realidad demanda que los paises progresistas del mundo redoblen la vigilancia sobre la enganosa "reduccion armamentista" de EE.UU. y se dispongan estrictamente de los preparativos de contramedida militar frente a ello.
					
					  En los ultimos dias, el portaaviones militar y otras fuerzas armadas de golpe estrategico de EE.UU. armaron una campana belica en el Sur de Corea y su contorno llevando la situacion al borde de guerra.
					
					  La peor situacion de la Peninsula Coreana  prueba fehacientemente cuan justa fue la medida de la RPDC: en el pasado presto atencion al fortalecimiento del poderio de defensa nacional.
